name: test
description: This is a test package.json to run run-run on.

scripts.test: npm run test-start; npm run tests; npm run test-end
scripts.tests: npm run test-no-var; npm run test-vars; npm run test-args; npm run test-pipe; npm run test-combined; npm run test-npm-shortcut; npm run test-read-env; npm run run-tests
scripts.test-vars: node ../index.js SCRIPT=test-vars VARIABLE2=world -- "npm run echo -- test-out/test-vars 'hello {SCRIPT} and {VARIABLE2}'"
scripts.test-args: node ../index.js --SCRIPT test-args --VARIABLE2 mars -- "npm run echo -- test-out/test-args 'hello {SCRIPT} and {VARIABLE2}'"
scripts.test-pipe: node getVars.js | node ../index.js -- "npm run echo -- test-out/test-pipe 'hello {SCRIPT} and {VARIABLE2}'"
scripts.test-combined: node getVars.js | node ../index.js SCRIPT=test-combined --VARIABLE3=Dog -- "npm run echo -- test-out/test-combined 'hello {SCRIPT} and {VARIABLE2} and {VARIABLE3}'"

author: Mikko Haapoja <me@mikkoh.com>
